paper_abstract: This paper is devoted to extending common factors and categorical variables in the model of a finite mixture of factor analyzers based on the multivariate generalized linear model and the principle of maximum random utility in the probabilistic choice theory. The EM algorithm and Newton-Raphson algorithm are used to estimate model parameters, and then the algorithm is illustrated with a simulation study and a real example. (c) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The EM algorithm for the extended finite mixture of the factor analyzers model
